author: Alasdair Stuart
comment: Don't purchase this app!! My wife previously downloaded this and I bought a premium account. Now upgraded phone and is being charged to download app again!! Criminal!

author: Aminul Hussain
comment: Bought it a while ago and now doesn't give me the premium features. Thieves!

author: Vadim Fedorov
comment: Your forecasts are great, but why would the weather app need access to my contacts in order to activate premium features? Just doesn't make sense.

author: Daniel Madia
comment: What 's happened? Don't work after update. Please fix it...

reply.author: MeteoGroup
reply.content: Please try to reinstall the app. If this doesn´t solve the problem, please contact the support with more details.

author: benjamin mazereeuw
comment: Great app for Carp fishing. Easy to read hPa scale for many days
Near accurate forecast. Good graphics

author: Lee Wright
comment: Fantastic app. Had it for years on ios and android. Incredibly accurate, very useful as a gardener. Just wish it had Samsung gear support.

author: Anton de Zeeuw
comment: For years now this is the single app I trust for weather info. I've bought it for my iOS tablets and my Android phone. Predictable, reliable and a good user interface.   For Android I do miss a widget that just shows the day, rather than the week. I would argue that a widget showing the day, makes more sense to have than one showing the week's weather.

author: Howard Kirby
comment: Always used this app but recently the alerts seem a bit off. For e.g. today there was a high wind speed alert for this evening but the symbols suggest 8mph gusting to 16mph.  Only the highest two alerts are ticked on my settings so why was it showing up? On the next refresh the alert disappeared. Wind speed had not changed though. Similar happened at the weekend. Samsung Galaxy S5

author: Shaun Puckering
comment: Weather Pro has been my go to weather app for the last few years and has been way better than any of the other so called rivals. However, by comparison, the new user interface and general layout is poor and if it doesn't go back to how it was I doubt I will renew my subscription. It seems I'm not the only one with this gripe. Please listen and turn it back into the excellent app it once was! Pleeeeeaaassseeee!  Fixed. Excellent again :-)

author: Paul Bridgland
comment: Bought premium for the ski forecast element which it is still advertising and it does not exist. They acknowledge this but still talk about it in the description and no refund forthcoming. Being sold under false pretence.

author: Bobby Hill
comment: Why are you now putting annoying full screen popup advertisements in the paid version of weather pro?  (AD links to Weather & Radar UK)  Fix this please or refund everyone their money.  If you want to charge an expensive subscription, at least provide the service of adfree to the paid version of the app as originally advertised.

author: Patrick W
comment: I'm sure I've reviewed this before, but it seems not. Have been a Premium customer for about 7 years on Apple and Android and was lured away from the incrrasingly outdated (at the time), Met Office app. Now, I'm beginning to find the same things annoying me with Weatherpro that made me move from the Met office. I have a much faster phone these days, yet increasingly finding the WP Map animations slow & clunky. Also slow to update. So you are told about the weather you have already had and no projection as to how it might pad out. You can't help but wonder if this app is being neglected now Meteogroup have the BBC taking up their time?
Great APP. The icing on the cake would be the facility to scroll between days. And to scroll between hours of the same day.

author: Tarek Karawya
comment: App has problem with location

author: M E Martin
comment: Extremely useful multi-model global analysis and longer-range local forecast.

author: Thomas Juul
comment: My daily app

author: Mike Turner
comment: No complaints, consistently accurate forecasting regularly updated

author: Andrew Russell
comment: Much better than the met Office

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. Been using it for years.

author: Mehrdad Parsa
comment: Very accurate

author: Volker Jacob
comment: good visual presentation. worked for me for quite some time in Germany and Switzerland but in app purchase offerings are a bit annoying - and the forecast is completely useless in Portugal. not using the app anymore.

author: Mike Regan
comment: This was and really us exceptional application. Twice now I paid annual subscription to lose it a month or 2 later with the update subscription failing to register that I've already paid. E-mailed support multiple times. No response received at any point. I won't be buying any more.

author: john ousby
comment: Could be such a great app. So much basic stuff should be included in the original price. To ask $10 for another upgrade just to make the app work is misguided at best, plain greedy at worst.

author: Paulo Felipe Jarschel
comment: It used to be the best out there, not a single doubt about it. I paid for this version knowing it was money well spent. Until the premium subscription bs started. Want hourly forecast? Buy a subscription! Want more details on the map? Become a premium member! I simply can't take this anymore, and after many years, I am finally switching to another weather app.

author: A Google User
comment: I have used this app for years but now Norton is saying that this app is a privacy risk and shares user id or email accounts linked to device to a 3rd party of unknown source and could leave me open to spamming or phishing attacks!! Why is that? I've dropped my rating because of this and would like an answer to.

author: Alejandro Quintanar
comment: I bought the Pro version and it was not a full featured version, instead you need pay a premium subscription to have features like change themes. The Pro term for me is a fake advertising.

author: Michael Opray
comment: Paid premium and still need a subscription?!? Very disappointed.

author: Edward Hopkins
comment: I paid for this app but it still demands annual subscription for anything more than basic functions. Deceitful!

author: Gabriel Aguirre
comment: Purchased it years ago. Then they removed features I like, which I would have to pay for again with a yearly subscription. Fool me once...

author: Lovenyah tx
comment: Terrible app. It was not up to date, can't do anything with out spending more money. Radar was confusing. Don't recommend.

author: Daniel Faust
comment: Haben wohl recht wenig Ahnung von UI-Design. Alles überwiegend in Blau egal ob heute oder morgen... WetterOnline ist da wesentlich besser. Das man dann zusätzlich noch ein Abo braucht, nur um die Regenvorhersage zu sehen, gibt der App den Rest.

author: Calin Ciortea
comment: Hello! We reset the smartphone factory and can not reactivate the account, the only possibility is to play again. I log in but nothing happens. (Samsung Note3)

author: A Google User
comment: What a ripoff. Last year it was £3.99 now it's £7.99!!! Crazy increase!  Not all that accurate and for the cost you expect accurate.

reply.author: MeteoGroup
reply.content: During the last years we did not increase prices, but published three additional apps (AlertsPro, RainToday and MeteoEarth) and offer to adapt your premium service to each of them for free. To ensure that we continue to meet our customers’ needs in the future, we have had to raise the prices.

author: Totyo Totev
comment: Very very good forecasts. A bit pessimistic. Exactly as it is needed :)

author: Julian-Maximilian Brenne
comment: Why did I paid? No new functionality.
It woks great. Have not given five stars because  doesn't have waves info

author: floran kane
comment: i paid for your software but you always have problem in your widget and didn't show anything and say problem in showing

author: Timothy Scott
comment: Paid for app, then wanted more payments, the free version is better than this. I want my money back now please.

author: Ben Dorsch
comment: Cannot set custom locations? Other features might be good but not helpful without a proper user interface. Edit: I finally figured out how to add custom locations! (+1 star)
